items.item: README.json with deployed frontend web app url
Frontend web app is deployed and functional
Single Page Application using Angular routing
At least three views: landing, main, and profile
Site has a consistent look and feel
Layout is responsive, for every view
Users log in using netID and three-word-passphrase
Users are appropriately notified of bad username+password
Logging in takes user to the main view
User status headline and profile are shown on main page
Updating of status headline is persistent to logout and re-login
Logging out takes user to the landing view, user is appropriately logged out
Non-logged in users cannot navigate to the main view or profile view
User's feed is display with newest posts first
Can add a new post (text only)
Post is implemented as an Angular directive
New posts are persistent to log off and refresh
Can update a post
Can comment on a post
Comment is persistent
Can update a comment
updates to comments and posts are persistent
No hard coded data for status, profile picture, or posts: data comes from server
Little or no use of jQuery or direct DOM access (use Angular)
Directory structure follows components, i.e., separation of concerns
JavaScript source is appropriately divided into separate files by component
Unit test for updating status headline
Unit test for adding a new post
Unit test for editing a post
Unit test for commenting on a post
Unit test for editing a comment
Unit test for logging in a valid user
Unit test for invalid login
Unit test for logging out a user
Unit test of User service to share data between controllers
Valid coverage report included in submission
